Works well, and no issues. Got the warranty registered with Lenovo to match the purchase date. The laptop speed is fast. Battery backup is fine. So far no signs of over-heating.  The screen resolution is good. The initial default setting of brightness was too high, however a darker theme is easier on the eyes.  Overallreading comfort is good.  Windows 11 and lifetime MS office apps are good/as expected.  This is a good laptop for students, home use activities, DIY, etc...  The MacAfee LiveSafe offer popup of rs 199 was good for a years protection. The Two year default lenovo warrant is as advertised.  The Sound is loud from the speakers. Keyboard quality if good.  Upgradability from 8GM to 12GB/DIMM max is good to have for future. The 512GB SSD is fast. Can be upgraded to a TB in future.  Overall quality is good, nothing to complain about. Did not need any installation support.
  
Read more

If you are looking for a decent laptop and resonably priced this is the one. I liked the laptop and carries out my normal daily task with ease. Booting is quite fast and infact automatic boot once you lift the upper panel. Quite fast and snappy no lags with good audio quality. The only  complain is all the ports are on the left hand side of the laptop that makes it inconvenient. Also one more missing element is type c port. Overall a decent product.

Beautiful machine. Quiet, fast, fantastic screen, good keyboard,light weight and looks elegant. The only problem I had was the Touchpad response. The scroll response on two fingers was like you have put a handbrake in car and driving, to much inertia and slow. I fixed it with a registary hack, but chat with lenovo support drew a blank. Had to do it myself after seaching the net. Unless you are familiar with regedit please do not try it , ask someone who knows. For me it worked changing the Hexa value from 32 (default) to 12 in Computer \Hkey_Current _User\Software \Microsoft\Wisp\Touch\After that the scrolling two finger works like a charm. Cannot blame Lenovo though as I did not see anything in windows 11 settings for Touchpad to increase scroll speed. Pointer yes but not scroll 2 finger.Wish Lenovo does it in its driver support. I took off one star because of that. Otherwise a wonderful machine, coming from an 6 year old laptop , this machine rocks. Not a gamer so cannot comment on that.
  
Read more

Have been using this for 2 weeks now, below is my experience:Pros:+ excellent display, 2.8k OLED panel is awesome, vivid colors, very good contrast ratio, love watching videos on this device it has excellent viewing angles+ lightweight at 1.3 kg+ lightning fast with 16gb ram (I got this laptop specifically because it had 42xx MHz Freq ram. Other laptops have lower Freq ram ~3600 MHz)+ super fast charging, with a very small form factor+ Large trackpad and gesture support is good+ Battery life is average - I'm getting around 6-8 hours with moderate use, expected around 10 hours from this device+ Does not come with too much bloatCons- downfiring speakers which are just ok - you will need to connect to external speakers/ headsets for better experience- no backpack provided- only 1 usb port- does not run Linux well ( observed that xorg based distros work well, so this definitely looks like a problem with Wayland and not a distro/kernel issue) should be fixed with future updates.- there's no clarity on warranty registration date - default start date shows date of shipping which needs to be manually changed from Lenovo vantage app and takes 1-2 days - but this is not communicated to the user and is to be discovered on your own - a very poor experience as you could lose 3-6 months of warranty because of lack of awareness
  
Read more

I really appreciate Appario Retail Gurgaon,Amazon India and Lenovo India to brought such a good performance and value for money LAPTOP PC.The deal available on Amazon India on 06/08/2022 were amesome and I purchased this laptop at effective price of Rs53286(Rs14000 under old laptop exchange offer by exchanging my old HP Core I3 7th Generation with windows 10 Laptop and 5% Cashback on balance Rs56090.I had searched almost 100 Laptops on Amazon,Offline Store and Flipkart before purchasing this Laptop but i thought this is the best deal i got.Since prices of electronics items varies time to time hence may be possible that you get this Laptop PC even smaller value than me during any sale.But the prices of this Laptop is presently enhanced by Rs3000 as i checked as on 01.09.2022 compare to this Price was as on 06.08.2022 till 16.08.2022.Specifications given in product details page are correct.Also Battery backup is little bit smaller and charging time on little bit on higher side as compared in product details.But i will check further using different battery settings and different performance mode and update the same in near future with detailed product review.Anyhow good product with three years Lenovo Warranty, maximum by any Laptop manufacturer.PS:For 3 years warranty and MS Office 2021 you may contact to lenovo customer care on WhatsApp and toll free 24√ó7 number.Customer care details you may get in Lenovo Vantage Application came pre-installed with Laptop PC but you should have any good speed internet connection so that Lenovo executive install the MS office 2021 if you didn't get pre-installed.Also i had seen complaint of a customer to get the old laptop from Amazon because lesser warranty. But if you get lesser than 3 years warranty as the same may be checked through Lenovo Vantage App than please contact their customer care with invoice soft copy as proof of purchase and provided to them when they ask.Within 2 to 3 working days warranty at you Lenovo Vantage App updated 3 years from the date of purchase/ordering on Amazon.Also to check genuine product please ensure that package delivered should be properly sealed and Inner Lenovo Box seal should remain intact while delivery.As well as while using Brand new Laptop for first time  you have to connect it to good High speed internet as Windows 11 pre-installed on Laptop will be get activated and system will ask to configure Biometric and Face recognition settings under Windows Hello programme.This is one time exercise. So if you get Old Laptop any how you will never be asked to perform the above procedure.Any how if you make purchase from M/s Appario Retail on Amazon India it is very rare that you may get such type of problem.Thanking you.
  
Read more

Lightweight laptop as well as a compact usb c charger. Rapid charging and lasts approximately 4 hrs of continuous use, charging takes less than an hour. Excellent build quantity looks a every bit high-end. 2 thunderbolt4 and usb a and 3.5 mm.. that's it. Fast datatransfer with thunderbolt4 is a boon.Lenovo base warranty starts the day laptop leaves the factory, so you have to re-register once purchased to restart the warranty date. Seller should include this info in the listing.Excellent laptop go for it.

Beautiful machine. Quiet, fast, fantastic screen, good keyboard,light weight and looks elegant. The only problem I had was the Touchpad response. The scroll response on two fingers was like you have put a handbrake in car and driving, to much inertia and slow. I fixed it with a registary hack, but chat with lenovo support drew a blank. Had to do it myself after seaching the net. Unless you are familiar with regedit please do not try it , ask someone who knows. For me it worked changing the Hexa value from 32 (default) to 12 in Computer \Hkey_Current _User\Software \Microsoft\Wisp\Touch\After that the scrolling two finger works like a charm. Cannot blame Lenovo though as I did not see anything in windows 11 settings for Touchpad to increase scroll speed. Pointer yes but not scroll 2 finger.Wish Lenovo does it in its driver support. I took off one star because of that. Otherwise a wonderful machine, coming from an 6 year old laptop , this machine rocks. Not a gamer so cannot comment on that.

Works well, and no issues. Got the warranty registered with Lenovo to match the purchase date. The laptop speed is fast. Battery backup is fine. So far no signs of over-heating.  The screen resolution is good. The initial default setting of brightness was too high, however a darker theme is easier on the eyes.  Overallreading comfort is good.  Windows 11 and lifetime MS office apps are good/as expected.  This is a good laptop for students, home use activities, DIY, etc...  The MacAfee LiveSafe offer popup of rs 199 was good for a years protection. The Two year default lenovo warrant is as advertised.  The Sound is loud from the speakers. Keyboard quality if good.  Upgradability from 8GM to 12GB/DIMM max is good to have for future. The 512GB SSD is fast. Can be upgraded to a TB in future.  Overall quality is good, nothing to complain about. Did not need any installation support.

Beautiful machine. Quiet, fast, fantastic screen, good keyboard,light weight and looks elegant. The only problem I had was the Touchpad response. The scroll response on two fingers was like you have put a handbrake in car and driving, to much inertia and slow. I fixed it with a registary hack, but chat with lenovo support drew a blank. Had to do it myself after seaching the net. Unless you are familiar with regedit please do not try it , ask someone who knows. For me it worked changing the Hexa value from 32 (default) to 12 in Computer \Hkey_Current _User\Software \Microsoft\Wisp\Touch\After that the scrolling two finger works like a charm. Cannot blame Lenovo though as I did not see anything in windows 11 settings for Touchpad to increase scroll speed. Pointer yes but not scroll 2 finger.Wish Lenovo does it in its driver support. I took off one star because of that. Otherwise a wonderful machine, coming from an 6 year old laptop , this machine rocks. Not a gamer so cannot comment on that.

The GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is an exceptional product that boasts a range of impressive features.One of the standout features of this neckband is its 22-hour battery life. This is perfect for those who use their earphones throughout the day and don't want to worry about running out of battery. Additionally, the fast charging capabilities mean that you can get up to 4 hours of battery life in just 10 minutes of charging.The neckband design is comfortable and secure, making it perfect for active individuals. The magnetic buds allow you to keep them safely around your neck when not in use, and the design ensures that they won't fall off during physical activity.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also features ENC technology, which reduces external noise and enhances call clarity. This is especially useful for those who take business calls or work in noisy environments.Furthermore, the 10mm drivers provide excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear treble. This makes it perfect for listening to music, watching videos, or playing games. The gaming mode feature is a great addition for gamers, as it reduces latency and ensures smooth and uninterrupted gameplay.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also has a Type C charging port, which is fast and convenient. This means that you can charge your earphones with ease and won't have to worry about carrying around multiple charging cables.Overall, the GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is a fantastic product that offers exceptional value for money. With its impressive battery life, comfortable design, excellent sound quality, and range of features, it is a must-have for anyone who loves their music and wants a reliable and convenient earphone.

The GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is an exceptional product that boasts a range of impressive features.One of the standout features of this neckband is its 22-hour battery life. This is perfect for those who use their earphones throughout the day and don't want to worry about running out of battery. Additionally, the fast charging capabilities mean that you can get up to 4 hours of battery life in just 10 minutes of charging.The neckband design is comfortable and secure, making it perfect for active individuals. The magnetic buds allow you to keep them safely around your neck when not in use, and the design ensures that they won't fall off during physical activity.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also features ENC technology, which reduces external noise and enhances call clarity. This is especially useful for those who take business calls or work in noisy environments.Furthermore, the 10mm drivers provide excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear treble. This makes it perfect for listening to music, watching videos, or playing games. The gaming mode feature is a great addition for gamers, as it reduces latency and ensures smooth and uninterrupted gameplay.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also has a Type C charging port, which is fast and convenient. This means that you can charge your earphones with ease and won't have to worry about carrying around multiple charging cables.Overall, the GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is a fantastic product that offers exceptional value for money. With its impressive battery life, comfortable design, excellent sound quality, and range of features, it is a must-have for anyone who loves their music and wants a reliable and convenient earphone.

Additionally, the fast charging capabilities mean that you can get up to 4 hours of battery life in just 10 minutes of charging.The neckband design is comfortable and secure, making it perfect for active individuals. The magnetic buds allow you to keep them safely around your neck when not in use, and the design ensures that they won't fall off during physical activity.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also features ENC technology, which reduces external noise and enhances call clarity. This is especially useful for those who take business calls or work in noisy environments.Furthermore, the 10mm drivers provide excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear treble. This makes it perfect for listening to music, watching videos, or playing games. The gaming mode feature is a great addition for gamers, as it reduces latency and ensures smooth and uninterrupted gameplay.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also has a Type C charging port, which is fast and convenient. This means that you can charge your earphones with ease and won't have to worry about carrying around multiple charging cables.Overall, the GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is a fantastic product that offers exceptional value for money. With its impressive battery life, comfortable design, excellent sound quality, and range of features, it is a must-have for anyone who loves their music and wants a reliable and convenient earphone.

BLAUPUNKTüî•üî•üî•üëåüèªüëåüèªüíØBlaupunkt is an old german brand, their products are mostly known for car audio systems üîä but  I never expected this much quality from blaupunk when it comes to a tiny Bluetooth earbuds‚ù§‚Äçüî• The build quality is excellent  and mainly the sound quality is beyond expectations. These earbuds are made of high quality plastic material and these earbuds are truly light weight and the design is like it is made for gamers ‚ù§‚Äçüî•‚ù§‚Äçüî•‚ù§‚Äçüî• with nice cutting edges and the indicator lights they're actually giving a robotic vibeü§ñ also i really likes the bold italic BLAUPUNKT branding all these things made it looks more premium and stunning feel.üî•üëåüèªTalking about the sound quality its is the most important thing for all earbuds and this earbuds are tuned brilliantly, the highs mids and lows are just insane, the highs are crystal clear nothing more nothing less and mids are pretty damn good its gives pretty balanced and decent mid frequency outputs just like the sound coming from it feels natural and the low frequencies are pretty too damn good üî•üî•üî•üî• compared to highs and mids the low frequencies are tuned a bit more which i liked the most, just because im a bass lover. This earbuds comes with 10 mm drivers which is capable of producing deepbass which is extremely dope and punchy, its like boom boom boomüòÜüòÜüòÜ overall it gives an immersive feel while listening. I highly recommend this product to all the bass lovers out there who are looking for a bass earbuds üî•üëåüèªüëåüèªüëåüèªThis earbud features include gesture controls like single tap to pause/play and double tap to change track (on right ear piece for next and left for previous track) triple tap to increase/ decrease volume (left for down right for up). Tap and hold 3 sec to power OFF  also single tap for attending callsü§ó im using these earbuds about 2 months and i mainly use these for listening music and sometimes playing games like BGMI and im 100% satisfied with my music experience üòçand 96% satisfied with my gaming experience ‚ò∫ there is not much lag in sounds while gaming but i felt a 3%  delay sometimes but thats not a big thing, i brought this mainly for music not for gamingüòÜ also the noise cancellation also incredible, this earbuds also provides a decent call sound clarity ü•∞ what else do you need from a tiny earbuds ü§î Anyways im perfectly ok with this product ü•≥ü§óAn overall ratings from me about this BLAUPUNKT earbuds‚¨áÔ∏èSound quality 9.9/10Call sound 8/10Noise cancellation 9/10Battery backup 8/10Real-time gaming experience 8/10Unlike other earbuds on the market like MI, boat, truke, realme and one plus, this blaupunkt earbuds are extremely a beast in producing high quality sounds with deep and punchy bass. I bet you'll never get any better earbuds with this much quality within a price range under 1599ü§®üòé

BLAUPUNKTüî•üî•üî•üëåüèªüëåüèªüíØBlaupunkt is an old german brand, their products are mostly known for car audio systems üîä but  I never expected this much quality from blaupunk when it comes to a tiny Bluetooth earbuds‚ù§‚Äçüî• The build quality is excellent  and mainly the sound quality is beyond expectations. These earbuds are made of high quality plastic material and these earbuds are truly light weight and the design is like it is made for gamers ‚ù§‚Äçüî•‚ù§‚Äçüî•‚ù§‚Äçüî• with nice cutting edges and the indicator lights they're actually giving a robotic vibeü§ñ also i really likes the bold italic BLAUPUNKT branding all these things made it looks more premium and stunning feel.üî•üëåüèªTalking about the sound quality its is the most important thing for all earbuds and this earbuds are tuned brilliantly, the highs mids and lows are just insane, the highs are crystal clear nothing more nothing less and mids are pretty damn good its gives pretty balanced and decent mid frequency outputs just like the sound coming from it feels natural and the low frequencies are pretty too damn good üî•üî•üî•üî• compared to highs and mids the low frequencies are tuned a bit more which i liked the most, just because im a bass lover. This earbuds comes with 10 mm drivers which is capable of producing deepbass which is extremely dope and punchy, its like boom boom boomüòÜüòÜüòÜ overall it gives an immersive feel while listening. I highly recommend this product to all the bass lovers out there who are looking for a bass earbuds üî•üëåüèªüëåüèªüëåüèªThis earbud features include gesture controls like single tap to pause/play and double tap to change track (on right ear piece for next and left for previous track) triple tap to increase/ decrease volume (left for down right for up). Tap and hold 3 sec to power OFF  also single tap for attending callsü§ó im using these earbuds about 2 months and i mainly use these for listening music and sometimes playing games like BGMI and im 100% satisfied with my music experience üòçand 96% satisfied with my gaming experience ‚ò∫ there is not much lag in sounds while gaming but i felt a 3%  delay sometimes but thats not a big thing, i brought this mainly for music not for gamingüòÜ also the noise cancellation also incredible, this earbuds also provides a decent call sound clarity ü•∞ what else do you need from a tiny earbuds ü§î Anyways im perfectly ok with this product ü•≥ü§óAn overall ratings from me about this BLAUPUNKT earbuds‚¨áÔ∏èSound quality 9.9/10Call sound 8/10Noise cancellation 9/10Battery backup 8/10Real-time gaming experience 8/10Unlike other earbuds on the market like MI, boat, truke, realme and one plus, this blaupunkt earbuds are extremely a beast in producing high quality sounds with deep and punchy bass. I bet you'll never get any better earbuds with this much quality within a price range under 1599ü§®üòé

The GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is an exceptional product that boasts a range of impressive features.One of the standout features of this neckband is its 22-hour battery life. This is perfect for those who use their earphones throughout the day and don't want to worry about running out of battery. Additionally, the fast charging capabilities mean that you can get up to 4 hours of battery life in just 10 minutes of charging.The neckband design is comfortable and secure, making it perfect for active individuals. The magnetic buds allow you to keep them safely around your neck when not in use, and the design ensures that they won't fall off during physical activity.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also features ENC technology, which reduces external noise and enhances call clarity. This is especially useful for those who take business calls or work in noisy environments.Furthermore, the 10mm drivers provide excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear treble. This makes it perfect for listening to music, watching videos, or playing games. The gaming mode feature is a great addition for gamers, as it reduces latency and ensures smooth and uninterrupted gameplay.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also has a Type C charging port, which is fast and convenient. This means that you can charge your earphones with ease and won't have to worry about carrying around multiple charging cables.Overall, the GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is a fantastic product that offers exceptional value for money. With its impressive battery life, comfortable design, excellent sound quality, and range of features, it is a must-have for anyone who loves their music and wants a reliable and convenient earphone.

BLAUPUNKTüî•üî•üî•üëåüèªüëåüèªüíØBlaupunkt is an old german brand, their products are mostly known for car audio systems üîä but  I never expected this much quality from blaupunk when it comes to a tiny Bluetooth earbuds‚ù§‚Äçüî• The build quality is excellent  and mainly the sound quality is beyond expectations. These earbuds are made of high quality plastic material and these earbuds are truly light weight and the design is like it is made for gamers ‚ù§‚Äçüî•‚ù§‚Äçüî•‚ù§‚Äçüî• with nice cutting edges and the indicator lights they're actually giving a robotic vibeü§ñ also i really likes the bold italic BLAUPUNKT branding all these things made it looks more premium and stunning feel.üî•üëåüèªTalking about the sound quality its is the most important thing for all earbuds and this earbuds are tuned brilliantly, the highs mids and lows are just insane, the highs are crystal clear nothing more nothing less and mids are pretty damn good its gives pretty balanced and decent mid frequency outputs just like the sound coming from it feels natural and the low frequencies are pretty too damn good üî•üî•üî•üî• compared to highs and mids the low frequencies are tuned a bit more which i liked the most, just because im a bass lover. This earbuds comes with 10 mm drivers which is capable of producing deepbass which is extremely dope and punchy, its like boom boom boomüòÜüòÜüòÜ overall it gives an immersive feel while listening. I highly recommend this product to all the bass lovers out there who are looking for a bass earbuds üî•üëåüèªüëåüèªüëåüèªThis earbud features include gesture controls like single tap to pause/play and double tap to change track (on right ear piece for next and left for previous track) triple tap to increase/ decrease volume (left for down right for up). Tap and hold 3 sec to power OFF  also single tap for attending callsü§ó im using these earbuds about 2 months and i mainly use these for listening music and sometimes playing games like BGMI and im 100% satisfied with my music experience üòçand 96% satisfied with my gaming experience ‚ò∫ there is not much lag in sounds while gaming but i felt a 3%  delay sometimes but thats not a big thing, i brought this mainly for music not for gamingüòÜ also the noise cancellation also incredible, this earbuds also provides a decent call sound clarity ü•∞ what else do you need from a tiny earbuds ü§î Anyways im perfectly ok with this product ü•≥ü§óAn overall ratings from me about this BLAUPUNKT earbuds‚¨áÔ∏èSound quality 9.9/10Call sound 8/10Noise cancellation 9/10Battery backup 8/10Real-time gaming experience 8/10Unlike other earbuds on the market like MI, boat, truke, realme and one plus, this blaupunkt earbuds are extremely a beast in producing high quality sounds with deep and punchy bass. I bet you'll never get any better earbuds with this much quality within a price range under 1599ü§®üòé

The GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is an exceptional product that boasts a range of impressive features.One of the standout features of this neckband is its 22-hour battery life. This is perfect for those who use their earphones throughout the day and don't want to worry about running out of battery. Additionally, the fast charging capabilities mean that you can get up to 4 hours of battery life in just 10 minutes of charging.The neckband design is comfortable and secure, making it perfect for active individuals. The magnetic buds allow you to keep them safely around your neck when not in use, and the design ensures that they won't fall off during physical activity.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also features ENC technology, which reduces external noise and enhances call clarity. This is especially useful for those who take business calls or work in noisy environments.Furthermore, the 10mm drivers provide excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear treble. This makes it perfect for listening to music, watching videos, or playing games. The gaming mode feature is a great addition for gamers, as it reduces latency and ensures smooth and uninterrupted gameplay.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also has a Type C charging port, which is fast and convenient. This means that you can charge your earphones with ease and won't have to worry about carrying around multiple charging cables.Overall, the GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is a fantastic product that offers exceptional value for money. With its impressive battery life, comfortable design, excellent sound quality, and range of features, it is a must-have for anyone who loves their music and wants a reliable and convenient earphone.

The error on the opposite side of the call can barely hear what you are talking , so the noise cancellation feature gets 2 stars . The build and style is very good though .

The GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is an exceptional product that boasts a range of impressive features.One of the standout features of this neckband is its 22-hour battery life. This is perfect for those who use their earphones throughout the day and don't want to worry about running out of battery. Additionally, the fast charging capabilities mean that you can get up to 4 hours of battery life in just 10 minutes of charging.The neckband design is comfortable and secure, making it perfect for active individuals. The magnetic buds allow you to keep them safely around your neck when not in use, and the design ensures that they won't fall off during physical activity.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also features ENC technology, which reduces external noise and enhances call clarity. This is especially useful for those who take business calls or work in noisy environments.Furthermore, the 10mm drivers provide excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear treble. This makes it perfect for listening to music, watching videos, or playing games. The gaming mode feature is a great addition for gamers, as it reduces latency and ensures smooth and uninterrupted gameplay.The GOVO GOKIXX 621 also has a Type C charging port, which is fast and convenient. This means that you can charge your earphones with ease and won't have to worry about carrying around multiple charging cables.Overall, the GOVO GOKIXX 621 Bluetooth Neckband is a fantastic product that offers exceptional value for money. With its impressive battery life, comfortable design, excellent sound quality, and range of features, it is a must-have for anyone who loves their music and wants a reliable and convenient earphone.

I am writing this review after using it for 3 days. I am amazed with many features that comes with this smartwatch at such affordable price whereas few things need to be improved upon.#Good Features:1. Great in look and light weight.2. Bluetooth calling with dialpad and contacts sharing3. Accurate heart beat, SPO2, steps counter and sleep sensor.4. Multiple features like Camera and music controls, weather info, AI voice controls etc.#Features to improve:1. Battery life lasted for 3 days with normal usage.2. Distance sensor does not seem correct after walking for 2-3 kms.3. More Watch faces could be added.4. Watch Da fit App could be improved as it does not have many fitness controls.Overall I am pretty satisfied with this smartwatch features and would recommend others to buy it.

[Update: Sept 29] boAt seems to have heard the feedback üòÄ and updated the watch faces. Now there are a few good ones to pick but a slight improvement over the ones the watch earlier had. Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.
  
Read more

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Pros1. Best looking smart watch in market (budget Apple Watch).2. Solid build quality with metal frame and silicon strap.3. Nice and rich features for little price4. Excellent battery life, definitely lasts for a week.5. Bright screen and nice visibility under day light.6. Perfectly working crown and back button.7. Speaker and clear mic addition is big plus.Cons1. Measurement accuracy is about 90-95%.2. Connectivity is some what problematic (disconnects when phone locked)3. Speaker sound is average and not adequate for noisy environment.ConclusionFinally, a best looking and perfectly build solid smart watch which offers great value for money with its features and battery life. Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

[Update: Sept 29] boAt seems to have heard the feedback üòÄ and updated the watch faces. Now there are a few good ones to pick but a slight improvement over the ones the watch earlier had. Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.
  
Read more

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Today only i recieved this watch at first instance it win my heart ....I was using it a whole day and i found some pros and cons of this watchPros# Amoled Display is very bright and nice# Look and design is premium# Bluetooth calling is awesome, speaker is loud and clear . Even my voice is reaching to opposite party very clearly while calling with watch.# calculator features is useful# Multi Functional crown button is easy and useful .. Easily to change theme with just scroll the crown button# play music directly from the watch with the internal storage although its only 128 mb but sufficient to store around 10 songs approx.. song sound quality is also fine# strap quality is good and soft# TWS connecting features is also niceCons# sometimes i found watch is disconnected with my phone  ..not sure why its happened as i have checked only for one day# fingerprints are clearly visible on  Screen Glass .. i have attached the pic for it#Health Tracker are near to accurate but never rely on smartwatch at this price range.i have measure the bp with this watch and with bp machine both results are different... 70-80% accurate only..# AI Voice assistant is not very useful as it only work for mobile when i press the voice assistant button on watch .. like if i give command to set alarm on watch it set alarm on mobile so basically it just a button to wake up google assistant for mobile phone.#Sometimes when you pick call from your mobile phone call automatically transfer to watch and voice started coming from the watch speaker.. which is quite irritating..this must be correct by firmware updates i have purchased it for Rs.3420/- including bank offer . For this price range overall its a good & premium watch ..Its my experience with this watch for just a one dayRest how it work for long run that depends..

Easily to change theme with just scroll the crown button# play music directly from the watch with the internal storage although its only 128 mb but sufficient to store around 10 songs approx.. song sound quality is also fine# strap quality is good and soft# TWS connecting features is also niceCons# sometimes i found watch is disconnected with my phone  ..not sure why its happened as i have checked only for one day# fingerprints are clearly visible on  Screen Glass .. i have attached the pic for it#Health Tracker are near to accurate but never rely on smartwatch at this price range.i have measure the bp with this watch and with bp machine both results are different... 70-80% accurate only..# AI Voice assistant is not very useful as it only work for mobile when i press the voice assistant button on watch .. like if i give command to set alarm on watch it set alarm on mobile so basically it just a button to wake up google assistant for mobile phone.#Sometimes when you pick call from your mobile phone call automatically transfer to watch and voice started coming from the watch speaker.. which is quite irritating..this must be correct by firmware updates i have purchased it for Rs.3420/- including bank offer . For this price range overall its a good & premium watch ..Its my experience with this watch for just a one dayRest how it work for long run that depends..

[Update: Sept 29] boAt seems to have heard the feedback üòÄ and updated the watch faces. Now there are a few good ones to pick but a slight improvement over the ones the watch earlier had. Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Pros1. Best looking smart watch in market (budget Apple Watch).2. Solid build quality with metal frame and silicon strap.3. Nice and rich features for little price4. Excellent battery life, definitely lasts for a week.5. Bright screen and nice visibility under day light.6. Perfectly working crown and back button.7. Speaker and clear mic addition is big plus.Cons1. Measurement accuracy is about 90-95%.2. Connectivity is some what problematic (disconnects when phone locked)3. Speaker sound is average and not adequate for noisy environment.ConclusionFinally, a best looking and perfectly build solid smart watch which offers great value for money with its features and battery life. Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

I got this smartwatch during first day of the sale and was delivered within one day so thanks to Amazon. I am quite impressed with the build & design as the watch is very lightweight. Actually, the amoled screen got my attention which is rare to see at this price range and it's absolutely great. UI is also smooth and snappy but don't expect it to be equal with the watches that has "Wear OS". Performance wise, it shows all the notifications, can mute calls, has quick reply functionality which works for calls and normal messages only not the social media ones, can track daily activities and has so many sports mode. Now I have only used this watch for few hours so not the final verdict which I'll be updating after I use this watch for a long term.

But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.
  
Read more

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Pros1. Best looking smart watch in market (budget Apple Watch).2. Solid build quality with metal frame and silicon strap.3. Nice and rich features for little price4. Excellent battery life, definitely lasts for a week.5. Bright screen and nice visibility under day light.6. Perfectly working crown and back button.7. Speaker and clear mic addition is big plus.Cons1. Measurement accuracy is about 90-95%.2. Connectivity is some what problematic (disconnects when phone locked)3. Speaker sound is average and not adequate for noisy environment.ConclusionFinally, a best looking and perfectly build solid smart watch which offers great value for money with its features and battery life. Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

I am writing this review after using it for 3 days. I am amazed with many features that comes with this smartwatch at such affordable price whereas few things need to be improved upon.#Good Features:1. Great in look and light weight.2. Bluetooth calling with dialpad and contacts sharing3. Accurate heart beat, SPO2, steps counter and sleep sensor.4. Multiple features like Camera and music controls, weather info, AI voice controls etc.#Features to improve:1. Battery life lasted for 3 days with normal usage.2. Distance sensor does not seem correct after walking for 2-3 kms.3. More Watch faces could be added.4. Watch Da fit App could be improved as it does not have many fitness controls.Overall I am pretty satisfied with this smartwatch features and would recommend others to buy it.

Today only i recieved this watch at first instance it win my heart ....I was using it a whole day and i found some pros and cons of this watchPros# Amoled Display is very bright and nice# Look and design is premium# Bluetooth calling is awesome, speaker is loud and clear . Even my voice is reaching to opposite party very clearly while calling with watch.# calculator features is useful# Multi Functional crown button is easy and useful .. Easily to change theme with just scroll the crown button# play music directly from the watch with the internal storage although its only 128 mb but sufficient to store around 10 songs approx.. song sound quality is also fine# strap quality is good and soft# TWS connecting features is also niceCons# sometimes i found watch is disconnected with my phone  ..not sure why its happened as i have checked only for one day# fingerprints are clearly visible on  Screen Glass .. i have attached the pic for it#Health Tracker are near to accurate but never rely on smartwatch at this price range.i have measure the bp with this watch and with bp machine both results are different... 70-80% accurate only..# AI Voice assistant is not very useful as it only work for mobile when i press the voice assistant button on watch .. like if i give command to set alarm on watch it set alarm on mobile so basically it just a button to wake up google assistant for mobile phone.#Sometimes when you pick call from your mobile phone call automatically transfer to watch and voice started coming from the watch speaker.. which is quite irritating..this must be correct by firmware updates i have purchased it for Rs.3420/- including bank offer . For this price range overall its a good & premium watch ..Its my experience with this watch for just a one dayRest how it work for long run that depends..

[Update: Sept 29] boAt seems to have heard the feedback üòÄ and updated the watch faces. Now there are a few good ones to pick but a slight improvement over the ones the watch earlier had. Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.
  
Read more

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Pros1. Best looking smart watch in market (budget Apple Watch).2. Solid build quality with metal frame and silicon strap.3. Nice and rich features for little price4. Excellent battery life, definitely lasts for a week.5. Bright screen and nice visibility under day light.6. Perfectly working crown and back button.7. Speaker and clear mic addition is big plus.Cons1. Measurement accuracy is about 90-95%.2. Connectivity is some what problematic (disconnects when phone locked)3. Speaker sound is average and not adequate for noisy environment.ConclusionFinally, a best looking and perfectly build solid smart watch which offers great value for money with its features and battery life. Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

I got this smartwatch during first day of the sale and was delivered within one day so thanks to Amazon. I am quite impressed with the build & design as the watch is very lightweight. Actually, the amoled screen got my attention which is rare to see at this price range and it's absolutely great. UI is also smooth and snappy but don't expect it to be equal with the watches that has "Wear OS". Performance wise, it shows all the notifications, can mute calls, has quick reply functionality which works for calls and normal messages only not the social media ones, can track daily activities and has so many sports mode. Now I have only used this watch for few hours so not the final verdict which I'll be updating after I use this watch for a long term.

And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.
  
Read more

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Pros1. Best looking smart watch in market (budget Apple Watch).2. Solid build quality with metal frame and silicon strap.3. Nice and rich features for little price4. Excellent battery life, definitely lasts for a week.5. Bright screen and nice visibility under day light.6. Perfectly working crown and back button.7. Speaker and clear mic addition is big plus.Cons1. Measurement accuracy is about 90-95%.2. Connectivity is some what problematic (disconnects when phone locked)3. Speaker sound is average and not adequate for noisy environment.ConclusionFinally, a best looking and perfectly build solid smart watch which offers great value for money with its features and battery life. Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

Today only i recieved this watch at first instance it win my heart ....I was using it a whole day and i found some pros and cons of this watchPros# Amoled Display is very bright and nice# Look and design is premium# Bluetooth calling is awesome, speaker is loud and clear . Even my voice is reaching to opposite party very clearly while calling with watch.# calculator features is useful# Multi Functional crown button is easy and useful .. Easily to change theme with just scroll the crown button# play music directly from the watch with the internal storage although its only 128 mb but sufficient to store around 10 songs approx.. song sound quality is also fine# strap quality is good and soft# TWS connecting features is also niceCons# sometimes i found watch is disconnected with my phone  ..not sure why its happened as i have checked only for one day# fingerprints are clearly visible on  Screen Glass .. i have attached the pic for it#Health Tracker are near to accurate but never rely on smartwatch at this price range.i have measure the bp with this watch and with bp machine both results are different... 70-80% accurate only..# AI Voice assistant is not very useful as it only work for mobile when i press the voice assistant button on watch .. like if i give command to set alarm on watch it set alarm on mobile so basically it just a button to wake up google assistant for mobile phone.#Sometimes when you pick call from your mobile phone call automatically transfer to watch and voice started coming from the watch speaker.. which is quite irritating..this must be correct by firmware updates i have purchased it for Rs.3420/- including bank offer . For this price range overall its a good & premium watch ..Its my experience with this watch for just a one dayRest how it work for long run that depends..

Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

I am writing this review after using it for 3 days. I am amazed with many features that comes with this smartwatch at such affordable price whereas few things need to be improved upon.#Good Features:1. Great in look and light weight.2. Bluetooth calling with dialpad and contacts sharing3. Accurate heart beat, SPO2, steps counter and sleep sensor.4. Multiple features like Camera and music controls, weather info, AI voice controls etc.#Features to improve:1. Battery life lasted for 3 days with normal usage.2. Distance sensor does not seem correct after walking for 2-3 kms.3. More Watch faces could be added.4. Watch Da fit App could be improved as it does not have many fitness controls.Overall I am pretty satisfied with this smartwatch features and would recommend others to buy it.

[Update: Sept 29] boAt seems to have heard the feedback üòÄ and updated the watch faces. Now there are a few good ones to pick but a slight improvement over the ones the watch earlier had. Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.
  
Read more

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Today only i recieved this watch at first instance it win my heart ....I was using it a whole day and i found some pros and cons of this watchPros# Amoled Display is very bright and nice# Look and design is premium# Bluetooth calling is awesome, speaker is loud and clear . Even my voice is reaching to opposite party very clearly while calling with watch.# calculator features is useful# Multi Functional crown button is easy and useful .. Easily to change theme with just scroll the crown button# play music directly from the watch with the internal storage although its only 128 mb but sufficient to store around 10 songs approx.. song sound quality is also fine# strap quality is good and soft# TWS connecting features is also niceCons# sometimes i found watch is disconnected with my phone  ..not sure why its happened as i have checked only for one day# fingerprints are clearly visible on  Screen Glass .. i have attached the pic for it#Health Tracker are near to accurate but never rely on smartwatch at this price range.i have measure the bp with this watch and with bp machine both results are different... 70-80% accurate only..# AI Voice assistant is not very useful as it only work for mobile when i press the voice assistant button on watch .. like if i give command to set alarm on watch it set alarm on mobile so basically it just a button to wake up google assistant for mobile phone.#Sometimes when you pick call from your mobile phone call automatically transfer to watch and voice started coming from the watch speaker.. which is quite irritating..this must be correct by firmware updates i have purchased it for Rs.3420/- including bank offer . For this price range overall its a good & premium watch ..Its my experience with this watch for just a one dayRest how it work for long run that depends..

Today only i recieved this watch at first instance it win my heart ....I was using it a whole day and i found some pros and cons of this watchPros# Amoled Display is very bright and nice# Look and design is premium# Bluetooth calling is awesome, speaker is loud and clear . Even my voice is reaching to opposite party very clearly while calling with watch.# calculator features is useful# Multi Functional crown button is easy and useful .. Easily to change theme with just scroll the crown button# play music directly from the watch with the internal storage although its only 128 mb but sufficient to store around 10 songs approx.. song sound quality is also fine# strap quality is good and soft# TWS connecting features is also niceCons# sometimes i found watch is disconnected with my phone  ..not sure why its happened as i have checked only for one day# fingerprints are clearly visible on  Screen Glass .. i have attached the pic for it#Health Tracker are near to accurate but never rely on smartwatch at this price range.i have measure the bp with this watch and with bp machine both results are different... 70-80% accurate only..# AI Voice assistant is not very useful as it only work for mobile when i press the voice assistant button on watch .. like if i give command to set alarm on watch it set alarm on mobile so basically it just a button to wake up google assistant for mobile phone.#Sometimes when you pick call from your mobile phone call automatically transfer to watch and voice started coming from the watch speaker.. which is quite irritating..this must be correct by firmware updates i have purchased it for Rs.3420/- including bank offer . For this price range overall its a good & premium watch ..Its my experience with this watch for just a one dayRest how it work for long run that depends..

[Update: Sept 29] boAt seems to have heard the feedback üòÄ and updated the watch faces. Now there are a few good ones to pick but a slight improvement over the ones the watch earlier had. Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.
  
Read more

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Pros1. Best looking smart watch in market (budget Apple Watch).2. Solid build quality with metal frame and silicon strap.3. Nice and rich features for little price4. Excellent battery life, definitely lasts for a week.5. Bright screen and nice visibility under day light.6. Perfectly working crown and back button.7. Speaker and clear mic addition is big plus.Cons1. Measurement accuracy is about 90-95%.2. Connectivity is some what problematic (disconnects when phone locked)3. Speaker sound is average and not adequate for noisy environment.ConclusionFinally, a best looking and perfectly build solid smart watch which offers great value for money with its features and battery life. Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.

Writing this review after 10 days use. It's design and display superb & 1.83 inch display will give more stylish look.Touch also working fine. Battery back up is amazing & get up to 10days without blutooth connectivity, but with blutooth connectivity battery drain fast and hardly sustain two days max. Watch faces are just average and hope boat will add more faces in future updation. Blutooth connectivity with phone is sometimes tricky,cause BT will connect with phone only after disconnect with boat app( this issue happening sometimes). Call clarity, speaker sound and mic is good. Sensors are working but I'm not an expert to measure accuracy of values so don't know whether it's correct or not. 20 contact can save but sometimes name of saved contact not displaying on watch while gets calls. Over all 4‚≠ê product

Speaker sound is average and not adequate for noisy environment.ConclusionFinally, a best looking and perfectly build solid smart watch which offers great value for money with its features and battery life. Most features are working perfectly and it offers best performance. Clear and bright screen is good for most out door conditions. If you prefer to buy a smart watch with awesome build quality and stunning look with all features which we use daily at a little price then definitely this will be your pick..!

The camera has lot of issues which outweighs its features.1. It connected to the WiFi router, but the WiFi disconnects every 10-15 seconds and reconnects again. The issue is not there when connected to a different WiFi router. Couldn't find the reason why this happens. I have 98% signal in the camera. Customer care wasn't any help. I can see that a lot of people have the same issue.2. The camera announces "disconnected from WiFi" and "connecting to WiFi" everytime it connects. This is weird, because we don't want others to know that the security camera is disconnected. An app notification is all that is required.3. This camera has motion tracking, but it seems not working correctly. The camera doesn't always go back to its original position after the movement stops. Hence I've disabled this feature in the app.4. Also, the camera is changing its position slightly for 2 days at night. So the footages are useless until it is manually moved back to the initial position. This is totally unacceptable behavior.5. Night vision is too bad. It is grainy. Looks like it doesn't have DNR / digital noise reduction. Video is also dull at night. It is usable only if used in a small room, or there is some light. If used outdoors (Use under the shade. Its not weather proof), turn on some light throughout the night. Otherwise night vision will be too dark and dull.6. Moving the camera position from the app instantly moves the camera lens. But the video has a lot of lag and it is difficult to control it from the app.7. Connecting to the video stream is laggy and it connects to the camera half of the time. Other time, we have to try again from the app.So far all Cons. Now the pros are:1. It has good day time vision. It is excellent for the price for daytime use. No issues during the day.2. The motion detection notifications are good. We can see snapshots of the motion detection alerts. This is beneficial since we can see who or what moved in the camera field of view without playing each motion detection video. A quick glance can give a lot of information. I own Tapo cameras which gives this feature only with their paid subscription.3. This camera has LAN port, unlike other turret cameras in this price range.4. The camera has ONVIF support, so it can connect to NVR. (I haven't tested this feature yet).I own and also have shared multiple Tapo security cameras and they all were pretty good. Bought this CP Plus camera for someone else because of the price, features and the brand value, but the software issues made the user experience too bad. The issues make this camera unreliable and unusable for me.
